title: Chaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaarge!!!
body: 1. so was just wondering if we could add a Leeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeroooooooooooooooooooooooy jeeeeeeeeeeeenekins into kled when ever he charges at someone thanks riot ^^

replies.body:
No, Leeroy  is about getting your own team killed, not just suiciding.

And this seems very unlikely, being a meme from a Blizzard game and all.

who said it was for suicide?
it'd be a pretty cool tho
maybe add that if he uses 'charge' when he's the only champion on his team left alive.
